title: Dragon Hornet
summaries: The Hornet is a flying enemy found in the Underground Jungle. They follow the Flying AI, floating just out of reach and then charging the player, while also firing stinger projectiles (at an increased rate in Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions)).

These stingers have a 1/3 (33.33%) chance to inflict the Poisoned debuff on the player for 10 seconds. In Expert mode, the chance is 1/3 (33.33%) for 20 seconds and 2/3 (66.67%) for 2â€“10 seconds. The stingers cannot be destroyed with weapons and travel at about the same speed as the darts from a Dart Trap.
